cbinstall.name: cb Geocode Factory
cbinstall.author: Pelloquin CÃ©dric
cbinstall.description:
This plugin is a free part of the Geocode Factory for Community Builder Component and exist in a PRO version, containing a silent geocode process during registration, and during profile update: Update to the pro version.

The Geocode Factory CB plugin allows you to display a map in a user tab, and allows the user and admin to geocode the user position from the entered address (city, street, country, zipcode). Another feature from the PRO version is to geocode the user in silent mode, during registration process.

param.name: geocodeAtReg
param.label: Auto geocode during registration
param.description: Allows you to silent geocode the user durring the registration.
param.option: Yes, I have the pro version

param.name: geocodeAtEdit
param.label: Auto geocode during edition
param.description: Allows you to silent geocode the user durring the profile edit process.
param.option: Yes, I have the pro version

param.name: geocodeBtn
param.label: Add geocode button
param.description: Allow the user to use a button to get the coordinates during the profile edition.

param.name: pickPoint
param.label: User can pick point
param.description: Allow the user to pick a point on the map or move the marker to get the coordinates during the profile edition.

param.name: width
param.label: Map Width
param.description: Width of the Google map (value in px).

param.name: height
param.label: Map Height
param.description: Height of the Google map (value in px)

param.name: overviewMapControl
param.label: Show Overview Map
param.description: Show the map overview control window.

param.name: apiKey
param.label: Your API Key (Get it from : code.google.com/maps...).

param.name: mapControl
param.label: Google Maps Pan/Zoom Buttons
param.description: Show the Google Maps pan and zoom control buttons.

param.name: doubleClickZoom
param.label: Double Click Zoom
param.description: Zoom the map on double click.

param.name: mapTypeControl
param.label: Google Maps Type Buttons
param.description: Show the Google Maps type control buttons to switch between normal map, satellite or hybrid view.

param.name: gfOkMigration
param.label: Start migration now
param.description: If set to yes, the module migrate your existing coordinates to the new fields (old values are preserved).
param.option: Yes, I have the pro version

tab.name: Location
tab.description: This tab allows to get, show and save the user coordinates

param.name: hwTabMessage
param.label: CB Hello World Tab Text
param.description: Actual hello world message to display in the tab (default: Hello Joomlapolitans!).
